registration_enabled.label: Enable New User Registration
registration_enabled.description: Allow new users to create accounts. Disable during testing or maintenance.

maintenance_mode.label: Maintenance Mode
maintenance_mode.description: Show maintenance page to all users except admins. ⚠️ NOT FUNCTIONAL - Toggle requires implementation (no enforcement currently active)

max_file_size_mb.label: Maximum File Size (MB)
max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum size for uploaded CV/resume files

enable_document_length_warnings.label: Enable Document Length Warnings
enable_document_length_warnings.description: Show warnings when JD or resumes exceed character limits. Disable to allow full-length documents without user confirmation.

max_resumes_per_upload.label: Maximum Resumes Per Upload
max_resumes_per_upload.description: Hard limit on total number of resumes that can be uploaded. Protects against extreme batch sizes.

background_queue_threshold.label: Background Queue Threshold
background_queue_threshold.description: Jobs with MORE than this many resumes will process in background (user gets email when done). Jobs with FEWER process immediately (user waits 2-5 min). Lower = more reliable but slower. Higher = faster but riskier timeouts. Recommended: 50-100.

api_concurrency_limit.label: API Concurrency Limit (Semaphore)
api_concurrency_limit.description: Maximum number of concurrent OpenAI API calls during AI analysis. Lower = slower but fewer rate limit errors. Higher = faster but more rate limits. Recommended: 5-15. Current: 10.
